mapper.select: select max(id), user_id, period, applicant, candidate, absentee, created, updated from person where user_id=#{userId} and period=#{period} order by id desc limit 1
select id, user_id, period, applicant, candidate, absentee, created, updated from person where id in (select max(id) from person where user_id = #{userId} group by period) order by period
select p.id, user_id as user_id, category, account, name, title, content, views, likes, p.created, p.updated from person p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id order by p.id desc
